title: On $L^p-L^{p'}$ estimates for a class of strongly damped wave equations
abstract:
The purpose of this paper is to obtain a fundamental $L^p-L^{p'}$ estimate
for a class of a strongly damped wave equations where the damping operator is
given by $-\delta \Delta$ with $\delta \geq 0$ and the constant in the estimate
is independent of the damping parameter $\delta.$ The method used here is based
on an estimate of the semigroup associated to the linear equation on the Besov
spaces and their elementary properties.
